channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国银行2月份将维持中期政策利率不变
item.description: China's central bank is expected to stand pat on a key policy rate when rolling over the maturing medium-term loans in just over a week from now, a Reuters survey showed, as the authorities appear to be keen to maintain currency stability.翻译:路透调查显示，预计中国央行将在一周多后的时间内展期到期中期贷款时维持关键政策利率，因为当局似乎热衷于维持货币稳定。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘：中国通货紧缩忧虑新年凶兆
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook.翻译:汤姆·威斯布鲁克 (Tom Westbrook) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国股市因监管调整而延续反弹
item.description: Beaten-up Chinese stocks were set for a fourth day of gain on Thursday after a change of leadership at the market regulator, shoring up expectation of further support measures as China heads into a long Lunar New Year holiday this week.翻译:在市场监管机构领导层发生变化后，遭受重创的中国股市周四将连续第四个交易日上涨，这增强了随着中国本周进入农历新年长假而采取进一步支持措施的预期。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 高瓴投资收购新加坡InCorp Global
item.description: Singapore-headquartered corporate solutions and business advisory firm InCorp Global said on Thursday it has been acquired by global alternative investment firm Hillhouse Investment.翻译:总部位于新加坡的企业解决方案和商业咨询公司 InCorp Global 周四表示，该公司已被全球另类投资公司 Hillhouse Investment 收购。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国股市持续上涨，日经指数跃升至新高
item.description: Chinese shares managed to hold onto weekly gains on Thursday as Beijing rolled out a slew of measures to revive market sentiment ahead of a week-long holiday, while the Nikkei vaulted to new heights after the Bank of Japan ruled out rapid rate hikes.翻译:由于北京在为期一周的假期前推出了一系列措施以重振市场情绪，中国股市周四成功守住了每周涨幅，而在日本央行排除快速加息的可能性后，日经指数飙升至新高。
item.author: Stella Qiu

item.title: 通货紧缩风险困扰中国消费价格创2009年以来最大跌幅
item.description: China's consumer prices fell at their steepest pace in more than 14 years in January while producer prices also dropped, ramping up pressure on policymakers to do more to revive an economy low on confidence and facing deflationary risks.翻译:1月份，中国消费者价格指数以14年多来的最大跌幅下降，生产者价格指数也出现下降，加大了政策制定者的压力，要求他们采取更多措施来重振信心低迷并面临通货紧缩风险的经济。
item.author: Qiaoyi Li, Ryan Woo

item.title: 中国居民消费价格同比下降0.8%，工厂通缩持续存在
item.description: China's consumer prices extended their decline for a fourth month in January while producer prices also dropped, underscoring deflationary risks facing the world's second-biggest economy as it struggles to mount a solid recovery.翻译:1月份，中国消费者价格指数连续第四个月下跌，生产者价格指数也下跌，凸显了这个世界第二大经济体在努力实现稳健复苏的过程中面临的通货紧缩风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国称梅西缺席香港比赛超出“体育领域”
item.description: Chinese state media, Hong Kong politicians and some fans swiftly condemned Argentine player Lionel Messi's participation in a match in Japan on Wednesday after staying on the bench just days earlier in a highly anticipated game in Hong Kong.翻译:中国官方媒体、香港政界人士和一些球迷迅速谴责阿根廷球员莱昂内尔·梅西(Lionel Messi)周三参加日本的一场比赛，几天前他在香港一场备受期待的比赛中坐在替补席上。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 危地马拉外交部重申与台湾的关系
item.description: Guatemala on Wednesday said it reaffirmed its ties with Taiwan, days after its foreign minister told Reuters the government would seek official trade ties with China while maintaining relations with Taiwan, which China claims as a province.翻译:危地马拉周三表示，重申了与台湾的关系，几天前该国外交部长告诉路透社，该国政府将寻求与中国建立正式贸易关系，同时维持与台湾的关系，中国声称台湾是一个省。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 对于中国的新环球旅行者来说，跟团游已经过时，北极光已经到来
item.description: Yuwei Zhangzou represents a new type of Chinese tourist.翻译:于伟掌走代表了一种新型的中国游客。
item.author: Casey Hall, Sophie Yu

item.title: 巴布亚新几内亚领导人马拉佩告诉澳大利亚经济增长带来安全
item.description: Papua New Guinea Prime Minister James Marape told Australia's parliament on Thursday his nation's economic growth would make Australia more secure, adding that nothing would come between the two neighbours.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚总理詹姆斯·马拉佩周四对澳大利亚议会表示，他的国家的经济增长将使澳大利亚更加安全，并补充说这两个邻国之间不会发生任何事情。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 美联储发表评论后美元盘整；人民币未受通胀数据影响
item.description: The U.S. dollar was trading in a tight range on Thursday as traders digested less dovish remarks from policymakers overnight and looked ahead to fresh economic data from the United States.翻译:周四美元窄幅波动，交易员消化了隔夜政策制定者温和的言论，并展望美国的新经济数据。
item.author: Brigid Riley

item.title: 台湾美国特使：中国试图通过“欺骗”手段来提升自己的影响力，但失败了
item.description: China has sought to "cheat" and "steal" its way to matching Taiwan in chip technology, but has yet to succeed despite investing huge sums, Taiwan's de facto ambassador to Washington said on Wednesday, while holding out the prospect of more Taiwanese semiconductor investment in the U.S.翻译:台湾事实上的驻华盛顿大使周三表示，中国试图通过“欺骗”和“窃取”的方式在芯片技术上与台湾匹敌，但尽管投入巨资，仍未成功，同时还表示台湾将加大半导体投资的前景在美国
item.author: Michael Martina, David Brunnstrom

item.title: 研究人员发现，“新闻”网站背后的中国公司在全球范围内推送亲北京的内容
item.description: More than 100 websites disguised as local news outlets in Europe, Asia and Latin America are pushing pro-China content in a widespread influence campaign linked to a Beijing public relations firm.翻译:欧洲、亚洲和拉丁美洲的 100 多家网站伪装成当地新闻媒体，在与北京一家公关公司相关的广泛影响力活动中宣传亲中国内容。
item.author: Zeba Siddiqui

item.title: 早盘竞价：描绘中国与通货紧缩的斗争
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 随着中国努力支撑遭受重创的市场，投资者仍期待更多
item.description: China's ousting of its securities watchdog head on Wednesday drew a muted cheer from markets, with investors holding out for bigger measures that would tackle the root of the malaise gripping the world's second-largest economy.翻译:中国周三罢免其证券监管机构负责人，这引起了市场的热烈欢呼，投资者坚持采取更强有力的措施，从根本上解决困扰世界第二大经济体的问题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国称中国针对关键基础设施的黑客活动可追溯到五年前
item.description: An advanced group of Chinese hackers taking aim at U.S. critical infrastructure have been active for as long as half a decade, American and allied intelligence agencies said in a joint statement on Wednesday.翻译:美国和盟国情报机构周三在一份联合声明中表示，一个针对美国关键基础设施的先进中国黑客组织已经活跃了五年之久。
item.author: Raphael Satter

item.title: “漫长而乏味的旅程”：企业对中国前景感到不满
item.description: Some of the world's top food, drinks and tech companies have struck a sour tone about Chinese demand, deepening investor worries about damage to firms exposed to the country and Beijing's ability to revive the world's second-biggest economy.翻译:一些全球顶级食品、饮料和科技公司对中国的需求表现出不悦的态度，加深了投资者对与中国有业务往来的企业受损以及中国政府重振世界第二大经济体能力的担忧。
item.author: Helen Reid, Emma Rumney, Ananya Mariam Rajesh

item.title: 北京应对动荡之际，中国抛弃了证券监管机构负责人
item.description: China has ousted the head of its securities watchdog, the official Xinhua news agency said, replacing him with a veteran regulator with a reputation for tough action as policymakers struggle to stabilise the country's stock markets.翻译:官方新华社称，中国已罢免了证券监管机构负责人，取而代之的是一位经验丰富的监管机构，该监管机构在政策制定者努力稳定中国股市之际，以采取强硬行动而闻名。
item.author: Samuel Shen, Tom Westbrook

item.title: 台湾因旅游业和航线争端而停止新的中国团体旅行
item.description: Taiwan told its travel agents on Wednesday to stop organising new group tours to China since Beijing has yet to allow such trips to the island by Chinese tourists and has altered a flight path in the sensitive Taiwan Strait.翻译:台湾周三告诉其旅行社停止组织新的前往中国的团体旅游，因为北京尚未允许中国游客前往台湾进行此类旅行，并且已经改变了敏感的台湾海峡的飞行路线。
item.author: Reuters
